title: My family: July 20th 1969
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Felicity Morgan-Rhind
brief_description: As man is about to walk on the moon. Kids are eating spaghetti, grandpa is having a heart attack and parent’s are trying to contact family to tell them they’ve named their new baby - Felicity. Cast includes Michael, Thomas and William Veitch, Jenny and George Davies, Stephanie Millar and James Reeson.
